text: Gelil datsonat tats kitwotsitse4:25 Tats kitwotsitse: Giriki noon keewon ayhudi woteraw ashuwots ikokere bo beyiru beyoko tats kitwotsi eteefoni. Kit jamwots bodatseyir Galil aatsi k'aroniyere aaw keshonat gáár weeron aaw kesho maantse.  Iyerusalemnat Yhudon, Yordanos fokoniyere bak'etse ayi ashuwots Iyesus shuutso shoyidek't bosha'i.
